vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἁπλότης, ητος, ἡ,
singleness, τῆς φωνῆς[Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II simplicity, πόλεως[Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.2 of persons, simplicity, frankness, sincerity, [NT+5th c.BC+]
__II.3 open-heartedness: hence, liberality, [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: Formally "the quality of singleness," translated "generosity," the state of giving things in a manner that shows liberality; "sincerity," the moral quality of honesty expressing singleness of purpose or motivation
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
Formally "the quality of singleness," translated "generosity," the state of giving things in a manner that shows liberality; "sincerity," the moral quality of honesty expressing singleness of purpose or motivation
simplicity, sincerity, purity, of mind, Rom. 12:8; 11:3; Eph. 6:5; Col. 3:22; liberality, as arising from simplicity and frankness of character, 2Cor. 8:2; 9:11, 13; 11:3*
